abstract: Wells Fargo, the nation’s largest home lender, overcame a slowdown in the mortgage market to report record net income of $5.5 billion, or 98 cents a share.
snippet: Wells Fargo, the nation’s largest home lender, overcame a slowdown in the mortgage market to report record net income of $5.5 billion, or 98 cents a share.
lead_paragraph: Wells Fargo, the nation’s largest home lender, posted a 19 percent increase in second-quarter profit on Friday as it overcame a drop-off in the mortgage market on its way to record earnings.
